sentences.en: "That's the weirdest thing I've ever seen," marveled Carl.
sentences.cn: 卡尔惊叹道：“那是我所见过的最怪异的事情了。”

sentences.en: But your health is more important, Carl. Believe me.
sentences.cn: 可是你的身体更重要, Carl, 相信我的话.

sentences.en: Carl had asked him to visit the hospital and to pay his respects to Francis.
sentences.cn: 卡尔已经让他去医院看望弗朗西斯。

sentences.en: Carl Lewis has broken the world record in the 100 metres.
sentences.cn: 卡尔·刘易斯已经打破了百米赛跑的世界纪录。

sentences.en: Carl pushed ahead in his eagerness to reach the wall.
sentences.cn: 卡尔为了能够到墙急切地往前挤。

sentences.en: Carl sits at a computer terminal 40 hours a week.
sentences.cn: 卡尔每周在电脑终端前坐40个小时。

sentences.en: Carl slipped a disc in his back while warming up.
sentences.cn: 热身时卡尔腰椎间盘不慎错位了。

sentences.en: Carl was building up to something.
sentences.cn: 卡尔正在为什么事情做准备。

sentences.en: Carl will be perfectly fine after we remove his tonsils.
sentences.cn: 切除扁桃腺之后,Carl会完全恢复健康的.

sentences.en: Christie retaliated by sending his friend a long letter detailing Carl's utter incompetence.
sentences.cn: 为了报复，克里斯蒂给他朋友寄了一封长信，细述卡尔完全不称职。

sentences.en: Her career began as prima donna with the Royal Carl Rosa Opera Company.
sentences.cn: 事业刚起步的时候，她在皇家卡尔·罗莎歌剧团担任首席女歌手。

sentences.en: I don't feel sorry for Carl. He knew the score, he knew what he had to do and couldn't do it.
sentences.cn: 我不为卡尔感到难过。他了解情况。他知道自己必须做什么但却没能做成。

sentences.en: It's always useful to have a hold over a fellow like Carl May.
sentences.cn: 能支配像卡尔·梅这样的人总是很有用的。

sentences.en: With such aids, the poetry of Carl Sandburg came into being.
sentences.cn: 有了这些帮助, 卡尔?桑德伯格的诗诞生了.
哟，卡尔，这身行头很不错嘛！

phrases.tran_cn: n. 卡尔兰德里（美国篮球明星）
卡尔刘易斯（美国田径名将）
